passive.name: Deflagration
passive.description: When the wearer's cumulative HP loss during one attack exceeds {{1, percent}}% of their Max HP, or if the amount of their own HP consumed at one time is greater than {{1, percent}}% of their Max HP, immediately heals the wearer for {{3, percent}}% of their Max HP, and at the same time, increases the DMG they deal by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> for {{4}} turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once every {{5}} turn(s).
